title: Looking for Dedicated Jungler Bronze/Silver
body:
Hey guys, my team and I are looking for a new Jungler, need to be bronze/silver in order to queue with us..

Needs to be knowledgable.

Needs to be able to read the map well. (map awareness)

Must know jungle matchups.

--------------------------

Please leave:

Summoner Name:

Top 5 Jungle Champs:

Reason why you want to be in a team:

What can you bring to the team:

replies.body:
Summoner Name: Esgaroth

Top 5 Jungle Champs: Master Yi, Kha'Zix, Rengar, Nocturne,Shaco (Basically any assassin type Jungler)

Reason why you want to be in a team: i had played in low level competition and enjoy the competitive and seeing how much i know or improve on champions, and play style as the games progress.

What can you bring to the team: i know mechanics of most champions and have a decent understanding of the different play styles based upon the items that each champion would get
Hey mate, do you have understandings of what fits well with certain team comps and such?
yeah, i have understanding of team comps, give me a champ and time, i will be able to use them in the way that you desire
Can you please explain what you meant in your reason why you want to be in a team? I can't really understand why you want to be in a team.

Summoner Name: mrshippyx

Top 5 Jungle Champs: Hecarim, Nocturne, Lee sin, Rek'Sai and Rengar

Reason why you want to be in a team: Looking to improve and learn better team coordination and communication. 

What can you bring to the team: I have very good mechanics for the most part and have great game knowledge but the one thing I don't do the best at is decision making which is what I'm working on atm, but for the most part i know when to gank when to stop farming and when to help the team.
Hey there, its good to see that you've included what you're not good at. What kind of decisions are you not good at making?

Summoner Name:Kylokylo
Top 5:Rek'Sai,Master Yi, Lee Sin, Ammumu, Kha'Zix
Reason:I wanted to start playing more competitive and im looking for people who can play during weekends and are on active on certain days and trying to get better.
What i can bring to team:I can bring good tactics, friendship and lots of wins. I tend to be the one who is like a captain because i spend most of my time reviewing my games and what i did wrong and so i tend to help friends in need who i can show where to ward position and others.
hey mate, do you know how to rotate the map well to be able to control the map, know/guess where the enemy jungler is and act accordingly?

Summoner Name: ShadesVN

Top 5 Jungle Champs: Yi, Shyvana, Rammus, Shaco, Quinn/Vayne

Reason why you want to be in a team: Get out of this b1 cancer known as s5

What can you bring to the team: Funtimez

Summoner Name: Garawdu

Top 5 Jungle Champs:
 Udyr, Amumu, Xin Zhao, Kindred
Reason why you want to be in a team: I play LoL alone, i would like some friends and some serious game plays not trolling players and toxic games.

What can you bring to the team: I can bring fun, skills and motivation.
hey mate, you're on the EUW server, this is for OCE server sorry

Summoner Name: ultragaminghut

Top 5 Jungle Champs: xin, vi, ww, udyr,amumu

Reason why you want to be in a team: Looking for a team environment that isn't toxic and that like to make smart plays not fight blindly.

What can you bring to the team: Was silver 2 in na last season just moved back to OCE so had to start from b5 :( but i am ready to pour all my spare time and effort into a team if you guys are will to also do so. I have great map awareness and play a good game ( personal opinion) would love to help you guys win some games give me a shot and if it doesn't work out thats fine.
I sent you a friend request
